name: Valentine Love Mesh Free
description: Valentine Love Mesh is a cool casual game, set in a gorgeous environment of the garden. Get ready to represent your manhood or womanhood and play as a girl or boy. There is a competition between girl and boy and the winner is going to meet his or her dream love. Be a part of this blind date competition. Choose your character and start the love battle. What you have to do is just collect as many gifts as you can without running over the kids, football, dogs and rabbits. This is a love fight to get highest score. Be careful people are walking around and trying to impede you.
